title: FS: 80 Card T206 Lot - All Cards $9, $11, $13, or $18 **PRICE DROP**
author: marcdelpercio

posts.post_title: FS: 80 Card T206 Lot - All Cards $9, $11, $13, or $18 **PRICE DROP**
posts.post_content:
Hello. I have the following T206 lot available for sale. Condition should be accurately reflected by the scans but please feel free to ask any questions. Please add $2 shipping for 1-2 cards. 3 or more ship for free. Payment via any method you prefer. Thanks for looking and please send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] to reserve cards or with any questions.

All cards in the first group are $9 each
All cards in the second group are $11 each
All cards in the third group are $13 each
All cards in the fourth group are $18 each

CARDS PICTURED (removing **SOLD** cards for easier viewing):

TAKE THE REMAINING 43 CARDS FOR $500 DELIVERED.
